name: Today'sDayandDate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is a simple flash briefing skill which enables Alexa to tell you today's day and date., brought to you by My Tech Tailor. We currently only support United States time zones. If you would like for us to add your timezone, if you have any suggestions, or if you're interested in our web/app development services, please contact us at info@mytechtailor.com or visit mytechtailor.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
